title: SMART compost sorting
description: Designed and implemented a robotic compost sorting system using a Franka Emika arm and depth-sensing AI vision. Developed within a ROS framework to automate the identification and separation of contaminants.

modalContent.value: Designed and implemented a robotic compost sorting system using a Franka Emika arm and depth-sensing AI vision. Developed within a ROS framework, this project successfully automated the identification and separation of contaminants from organic waste streams.
